email_text:
Subject: Your Spotify Premium Renewal Confirmation

Dear [Customer Name],

We hope this email finds you well. We wanted to inform you that your Spotify Premium subscription has been successfully renewed for another month. Thank you for continuing to enjoy ad-free music streaming, offline listening, and high-quality audio with Spotify Premium.

Here are the billing details for your recent transaction:

Subscription: Spotify Premium
Billing Date: [Date of Renewal]
Amount: $9.99

Payment Method: [Credit Card/PayPal/Other]
Last 4 Digits of Card: XXXX
Expiration Date: XX/XX

If you have any questions regarding your subscription or billing, please feel free to contact our customer support team at support@spotify.com. We are here to assist you with any concerns or inquiries you may have.

Thank you for being a valued member of the Spotify community. We appreciate your continued support and look forward to providing you with the best music streaming experience.

Best Regards,
Spotify Customer Support Team
